history.narrative: Law 17-271, the “Appointed Attorney Compensation Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-757 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and September 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 30, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-525 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-271 became effective on November 25, 2008.
